## MenuItem.setIcon() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
setIcon(icon: IconName | null): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>icon</code> | [`IconName`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/IconName.md)<code> &#124; null</code> | ID of the icon, can use any icon loaded with [addIcon()](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/addIcon.md) or from the built-in lucide library. |

`this`
